Posts.Content: Hi my Ca 27 29 is elevated was a normal 30, then 60,120,130. Im having all kinds of test my dr. requested. A CT Scan, Bond Scan, Pet Scan, MRI. could this be a false positive. I have been free of cancer for about 2 years and was having work done on a Breast Reconstruction. Both breast removed 1 10 years ago inflamatory breast cancer and 2 years ago left side breast cancer inflamatory. Thanks for you input. gloria
Posts.Title: CA 27 29 elevated
